long_description:
<p>Are winter blues getting the better of you? <a href="https://www.royaltonparkavenue.com/about/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Royalton Park Avenue</a> has the solution! Read on to get ideas on how to revive your body and pass the time in New York even when the weather doesn’t cooperate.</p>
<h3>Take a Fitness Class</h3>
 
 
<p>Nothing warms up the body like heart-pumping exercise. Maybe this isn’t the time to go for a jog in Central Park, so indoor fitness classes are the way to go. Located on the third floor of Royalton Park Avenue is <a href="https://www.royaltonparkavenue.com/exhale-fitness-spa/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Exhale Fitness Spa</a>, your ultimate wellbeing sanctuary. Choose from a variety of classes that include barre, yoga, cardio and HIIT. Classes start as early as 6am! If high-intensity indoor cycling is more up your alley, book a class at the <a href="https://www.royaltonparkavenue.com/fitness/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Royalton Park Avenue Flywheel studio</a>.</p>
<h3>Nourish your Body with a Spa Treatment</h3>
<p>Blustery wind and freezing temperatures aren’t kind to the skin. Luckily, <a href="https://clients.mindbodyonline.com/consumerbooking?studioid=-30&_ga=&tg=&vt=&lvl=&stype=-9&view=&trn=0&page=&catid=&prodid=&date=2%2F4%2F2019&classid=0&sSU=&optForwardingLink=&qParam=#/SelectServices" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Exhale Fitness Spa (Gramercy)</a> has a comprehensive treatment menu crafted to offer luxurious and decadent experiences. Start with a 60-minute Exhale Power Signature Facial to hydrate, exfoliate and tighten skin. Continue with one of the many 60-minute massages or body scrubs and finish with a beautifying session of brow shaping or brow/lashes tinting.</p>
<h3><img id="1549411800374" class=" " src="http://res.cloudinary.com/traveltripperweb/image/upload/c_fit,h_1200,w_1200/v1549411795/rkurzngvhygors5m1wac.jpg" alt="models-on-runway-at-new-york-winter-fashion-week" width="473" height="316" data-image-large="http://res.cloudinary.com/traveltripperweb/image/upload/c_fit,h_1200,w_1200/v1549411795/rkurzngvhygors5m1wac.jpg" data-image-medium="http://res.cloudinary.com/traveltripperweb/image/upload/c_fit,h_992,w_992/v1549411795/rkurzngvhygors5m1wac.jpg" data-image-small="http://res.cloudinary.com/traveltripperweb/image/upload/c_fit,h_768,w_768/v1549411795/rkurzngvhygors5m1wac.jpg" data-image-xsmall="http://res.cloudinary.com/traveltripperweb/image/upload/c_fit,h_300,w_300/v1549411795/rkurzngvhygors5m1wac.jpg" data-image-thumb="http://res.cloudinary.com/traveltripperweb/image/upload/c_fill,g_faces,h_140,w_140/v1549411795/rkurzngvhygors5m1wac.jpg" />Go to New York Fashion Week</h3>
<p>Your visit to Exhale will leave you looking your best. Now, dress to the nines and head to the many <a href="https://fashionweekonline.com/new-york/tickets" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">events in New York Fashion Week available to the public</a>. Starting this week and continuing until February 16, 2019, fashionistas can purchase tickets to special public events all over the city.</p>
<h3>Sip a Mug of Hot Chocolate at The City Bakery</h3>
<p>Have recent freezing temperatures chilled you to the bone? If that’s the case, we have the perfect cure. <a href="http://thecitybakery.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">The City Bakery</a> is bringing back its Annual Hot Chocolate Festival this February. It consists of an impressive selection of gourmet and original chocolate drinks and food. Each day of the month features a new flavor. Consult The Calendar of Flavors to find out what’s available.  </p>
<h3>Dine and Imbibe at Royalton Rooftop</h3>
<p><a href="https://www.royaltonparkavenue.com/eat-and-drink/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rooftop at Royalton Park Avenue</a> serves up a full bar and panoramic views of historic Park Avenue. Start your day with a delicious breakfast or come back after exploring New York for the day and have dinner with us. Our Happy Hour is available Monday - Friday from 4pm to 7pm, serving $7 Wine, $5 Draft Beer and $8 Mixed Drinks.</p>
<p>We have one last suggestion. With Valentine’s Day just around the corner, surprise your love with a <a href="https://www.royaltonparkavenue.com/offer/#valentine-s-getaway-package" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Valentine's Getaway Package</a> this February. Book now to receive a bottle of champagne, chocolates, and exclusive room discounts to celebrate the romantic long weekend.</p>
title: 5 Ways to Treat Yourself in NY this February
